mapper.select: SELECT NEXT_COUPON_PAY_DT AS NEXT_COUPON_PAY_DT, IFNULL(NEXT_COUPON, 0) AS NEXT_COUPON, IFNULL(ACCRUAL_DAY_CNT , 0) AS ACCRUAL_DAY_CNT, IFNULL(ACCUMULATE_AVG_COUPON, 0) AS ACCUMULATE_AVG_COUPON FROM PRODUCT_LEG_DATA WHERE INSTRUMENT_CD = #{instrumentCd} AND DT = #{dt} AND PAY_RCV_CD = #{payRcvCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_LEG_DATA ( DT, INSTRUMENT_CD, PAY_RCV_CD, NEXT_COUPON_PAY_DT, NEXT_COUPON, ACCRUAL_DAY_CNT, ACCUMULATE_AVG_COUPON ) VALUES ( #{dt}, #{instrumentCd}, #{payRcvCd}, #{nextCouponPayDt}, #{nextCoupon}, #{accrualDayCnt}, #{accumulateAvgCoupon} )
